title: Tragic Kingdom, Millionaires To The Rescue? 7.14.20
itunes:title: Tragic Kingdom, Millionaires To The Rescue? 7.14.20
description:
In episode 671, Jack and Miles are joined by the Forgotten: Women of Juárez's cohost Oz Woloshyn to discuss Disney re-opening this past weekend, white supremacy terrorism watch, millionaires begging to be taxed, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Proposed Asylum Rule- Public Comment Resources
  2. Florida shatters single-day infection record with 15,300 new cases
  3. Disney World Reopening Gets Mixed First Reactions As Fans Give Park’s Welcome Back Videos Horror Treatment
  4. Walt Disney World employees petition to delay reopening as coronavirus cases surge in Florida
  5. Disney World Draws Excitement and Incredulity as Reopening Nears
  6. Actors’ Equity Says Walt Disney World “Retaliating” Over Coronavirus Testing Demand; Disney Says Park Protocols Accepted By Other Unions – Update
  7. Mandatory masks, Mickey at a distance as Walt Disney World reopens
  8. ‘Inviting Disaster’: Disney World Reopening Inspires Worry From Health Experts, Optimism From Some Workers
  9. BREAKING: Hong Kong Disneyland to Close Again Due to Slight Rise in COVID-19 Cases
  10. 'We don't want to die': Father livestreams multi-town police chase with 5 kids in van
  11. Racist Flat-Earther Caught With 30 Bombs Trying To Blow Up Building
  12. Protesters hit by cars recently highlight a dangerous far-right trend in America
  13. Millionaires For Humanity
  14. WATCH: Dinner Party - First Responders

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
